attributes.action: urgently review and amend the Age Discrimination Legislation such that it cannot be used as a means of removing "pensioners concessionary fees" for Non-Vocational educational courses or any area where such concessions are normally granted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This legislation is currently being used as an excuse for removing concessions from all non-vocational courses throughout the country. This iniquitous logic could be applied to any other concessions in any field.I assume the legislation was not intended to be used in this way, and  therefore this action on the part of local authorities is not desirable and should be discouraged.
